org.apache.hadoop.fs.shell.find

Class FindOptions

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.fs.shell.find.FindOptions

  • public class FindOptions
extends Object
    Options to be used by the Find command and its Expressions.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private CommandFactory commandFactory
      Factory for retrieving command classes.
      private Configuration configuration
      Configuration object.
      private boolean depthFirst
      Indicates whether the expression should be applied to the directory tree depth first.
      private PrintStream err
      Error stream to be used.
      private boolean followArgLink
      Indicates whether symbolic links specified as command arguments should be followed.
      private boolean followLink
      Indicates whether symbolic links should be followed.
      private InputStream in
      Input stream to be used.
      private int maxDepth
      Depth at which to stop applying expressions.
      private int minDepth
      Depth at which to start applying expressions.
      private PrintStream out
      Output stream to be used.
      private long startTime
      Start time of the find process.
